content: Just noticed we now have rounded corners of message topic divs, and I feel that the sharp corners of the last message clash with that a bit? Screenshot-at-Sep-29-15-02-21.png
Yeah, so this is #6721 (not yet merged), which I'm hoping to get feedback on.
There's several changes included in that PR; we may choose to take some but not others.
I think I still like the > best :).

I think the current recipient bar design is making the stream name slightly overemphasized relative to the topic name, making it harder to skim interleaved views. Is anyone else having this experience?

I think the interleaved stream view has kind of always suffered from being hard to scan. I'm not sure the pill is any worse then the pentagon or the box when it comes to that. It probably makes sense to think about emphasizing the topic more in the recipient bar, though, to increase the signal-to-noise ratio:

pasted image
@Rishi Gupta I like what our mobile app does for stream views, which is to not show the stream in the recipient bar.
